subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Rob Ryan, the twin of Rex and a son of Buddy, wants to be a head coach in the N.F.L., but, for now, he must settle for being the Cowboys’ defensive coordinator.
snippet: Rob Ryan, the twin of Rex and a son of Buddy, wants to be a head coach in the N.F.L., but, for now, he must settle for being the Cowboys’ defensive coordinator.
